strapiPost.title: Downtown Rogers Prepares For A Dog-Themed Art On The Bricks Art Walk
strapiPost.content:
Pet lovers and their four-legged friends are invited to Barks on the Bricks this Thursday, May 11, for a pet-themed Art on the Bricks Art Walk, Downtown Rogers' monthly celebration of creativity.

  • On-leash: Lasting from 4:30-7:30p, the gathering will include pet portrait artists and photographers, visual artists, and pop-up booths by several non-profit organizations and businesses that serve the animal community.
  • Off-leash: Following the Art Walk, stick around Downtown Rogers for multiple entertainment opportunities like the stage performance of The Shadow Box at Arkansas Public Theatre, live music at Butterfield Stage, and Throwdown Thursday Karaoke at The Shire GastroPub.

Find a complete list of organizations participating in Barks on the Bricks HERE.
